scripts.build:storybook: rm -Rf storybook-static && build-storybook -s ./public # TODO: we shouldn't need to remove, but Storybook 6.1 has a small bug and can't remove existing build automatically
scripts.combine:reports: nyc merge reports && mv coverage.json .nyc_output/out.json # intermediate script
scripts.copy:reports: cp coverage-e2e/coverage-final.json reports/from-cypress.json && cp coverage-unit/coverage-final.json reports/from-jest.json # intermediate scripts
scripts.coverage:e2e: cross-env COVERAGE=1 npm run build && start-server-and-test start:test http://localhost:3000 'COVERAGE=1 cypress run'
scripts.coverage: npm run coverage:unit && npm run coverage:e2e
scripts.cypress:run: cross-env CYPRESS_DEBUG=false CYPRESS_coverage=false NODE_ENV=test cypress run --headless
scripts.db:test:reset: dotenv -e .env.test node .vn/scripts/db/reset.js # reset can only happen against the test database!
scripts.dev:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test next # Start app in test + dev mode
scripts.link-vulcan: ./.vn/scripts/link-vulcan.sh # for linking a local copy of Vulcan NPM monorepo (don't forget to publish in Vulcan NPM first)
scripts.mkdir:reports: rm -Rf reports && mkdir reports || true # intermediate script
scripts.mongo: yarn run start:mongo Â # shortcut for start:mongo
scripts.postcoverage: npm run report:combined # combine jest and cypress coverage reports
scripts.precombine:reports: npm run copy:reports && rm -Rf .nyc_output && mkdir .nyc_output || true # intermediate script
scripts.precoverage: rm -rf .nyc_output || true # delete previous nyx instrumentation
scripts.report:combined: nyc report --reporter lcov --report-dir coverage | exit 0 # intermediate script
scripts.start:mongo: docker run --rm -p 27017:27017 -v "$(pwd)/.mongo:/data/db" --label vulcan-mongodb mongo:4.0.4 # will start or create & start the image + store data locally in .mongo folder + remove the container when stopped
scripts.start:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run start # Start app in test mode
scripts.test:e2e: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run build && start-server-and-test start:test http://localhost:3000 'cypress:run'
scripts.test:vn: jest --testPathPattern=tests/vn # run tests for Vulcan Next itself, eg scripts (long)
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
scripts.typecheck: tsc --noEmit --p src/tsconfig.json # in case of error with @vulcanjs/* package, check that src/types (eg simpl-schema) are up-to-date with vulcan-npm
